Package lx4p

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LXUPnPDelegate
    LXUPnPDelegate is an interface for implementing Universal Plug and Play discovery.

    Class Description
    LXArtNet
    LXArtNet
    LXDMXEthernet
    LXDMXEthernet
    LXDMXInterface
    LXDMXInterface Abstract class representing an interface capable of reading and writing dmx contained in a serial or network packet.
    LXENTTEC
    LXDMXENTTEC.java
    LXHueInterface
    LXHueInterface provides a network interface connection to a Phillips Hue Bridge.
    LXJSONElement
    LXJSONElement is a class that holds an element of a JSON object tree.
    LXJSONParser  
    LXOSC
    LXOSC
    LXOSCArgument
    LXOSCArgument
    LXOSCMessage
    LXOSCMessage
    LXOSCPacketReader
    LXOSCPacketReader
    LXPButton
    LXPButton it highlights when it is moused over when clicked, it calls its mouseClicked() method to use LXPButton, create a subclass and override mouseClicked()
    LXPColorPicker
    LXColorPicker Displays a color wheel type color picker.
    LXPRadioButton
    LXPRadioButton is a member of a LXPRadioGroup it highlights when it is moused over when clicked, it requests the RadioGroup select its station
    LXPRadioGroup
    LXPRadioGroup is a controller for a group of RadioButtons only a single station (button) can be selected at a time
    LXPTextField
    LXPTextField is a member of a LXPTextGroup it highlights when the cursor hovers over it When clicked, it requests the LXPTextGroup select its station to receive keyPressed messages Other key presses are added to the fields value string which is displayed, up to the fields maximum number of characters.
    LXPTextGroup
    LXPTextGroup is a controller for a group of LXPTextFields only a single field can have focus and receive keyPressed messages
    LXPVScrollbar
    LXPVScrollbar is a vertical slider type control A LXPVScrollbar should receive both an update and draw message inside a PApplet's draw method.
    LXSACN
    LXSACN.java
    LXUPnPDiscoverer
    LXUPnPDiscoverer is a class for implementing Universal Plug and Play discovery.
